Package maldiniPaone.databaseConnection

Class UserDatabaseConnector

java.lang.Object
maldiniPaone.databaseConnection.UserDatabaseConnector
public class UserDatabaseConnector
extends java.lang.Object
This class connects with the database using connections generated by ConnectionPool. This class's methods are used to create users check their credential , modify them and delete users. All methods uses prepared statements to avoid possibility of SQL injections. Results are encapsulated in objects defined in maldiniPaone.utilities

  • Method Details

    • AddCitizen

      protected static boolean AddCitizen​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email) throws DatabaseNotFoundException
      Adds citizen to the database , gets a connection to the database from the connection pool and executes the insertion
      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the citizen to be added
      password - : the password of the citizen to be added
      email - : the email address of the citizen to be added
      Returns:
      boolean: true if the creation is successful, false if there is already a user with the given user name or email
      Throws:
      DatabaseNotFoundException - the connection to the database could not be instantiated

    • addMunicipalityByMunicipality

      protected static boolean addMunicipalityByMunicipality​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String creator, java.lang.String cityName, java.lang.String cityProvince) throws DatabaseNotFoundException
      Adds municipality to the database, gets a connection to the database from the connection pool and executes the insertion. Use this method when municipality is created by another municipality
      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the municipality to be added
      password - : the password of the municipality to be added
      email - : the email address of the municipality to be added
      creator - :the user name of the user who asked the creation of the municipality
      cityName - : the name of the city hall where the municipality works
      cityProvince - : the name of the city hall's province where the municipality works
      Returns:
      boolean: true if the creation is successful, false if there is already a user with the given user name or email
      Throws:
      DatabaseNotFoundException - the connection to the database could not be instantiated

    • addMunicipalityByManager

      protected static boolean addMunicipalityByManager​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String cityName, java.lang.String cityProvince) throws DatabaseNotFoundException
      Adds municipality to the database , gets a connection to the database from the connection pool and executes the insertion. Use this method when the creation is done by a system manager.
      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the municipality to be added
      password - : the password of the municipality to be added
      email - : the email address of the municipality to be added
      cityName - : the name of the city hall where the municipality works
      cityProvince - : the name of the city hall's province where the municipality works
      Returns:
      boolean: true if the creation is successful, false if there is already a user with the given user name or email
      Throws:
      DatabaseNotFoundException - the connection to the database could not be instantiated

    • addAuthority

      protected static boolean addAuthority​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String creator, java.lang.Integer districtId) throws DatabaseNotFoundException
      Adds authority to the database, gets a connection to the database from the connection pool and executes the insertion.
      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the authority to be added
      password - : the password of the authority to be added
      email - : the email address of the authority to be added
      creator - :the user name of the municipality who asked the creation of the authority
      districtId - : the id of the district in which the authority works
      Returns:
      boolean: true if the creation is successful, false if there is already a user with the given user name or email
      Throws:
      DatabaseNotFoundException - the connection to the database could not be instantiated

      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the manager to be added
      password - : the password of the manager to be added
      email - : the email address of the manager to be added
      venueName - : the name of the venue where the system manager works
      Returns:
      boolean: true if the creation is successful, false if there is already a user with the given user name or email
      Throws:

    • addCityhall

      protected static boolean addCityhall​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String province, java.lang.String region, Location location) throws DatabaseNotFoundException
      Adds city hall to the database , gets a connection to the database from the connection pool and executes the insertion.
      Parameters:
      name - : the name of the city hall that must be added
      province - : the province name in which the city hall is located
      region - : the region name in which the city hall is located
      location - :the user name of the user who asked the creation of the municipality
      Returns:
      boolean: true if the creation is successful, false if there is already a city hall with the same name and province
      Throws:
      DatabaseNotFoundException - the connection to the database could not be instantiated

    • addDistrict

      protected static java.lang.Integer addDistrict​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String province, Location locationTopLeft, Location locationBottomRight) throws DatabaseNotFoundException
      Adds district to the database , gets a connection to the database from the connection pool and executes the insertion.
      Parameters:
      name - : the name of the city hall in which the district is located
      province - : the name of the province in which the district is located
      locationTopLeft - : the coordinates of the top-left corner of the district area
      locationBottomRight - : the coordinates of the bottom-right corner of the district area
      Returns:
      Integer: returns the index of the newly created district or -1 if the creation is not successful
      Throws:
      DatabaseNotFoundException - the connection to the database could not be instantiated

      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the municipality whose city hall is being searched
      Returns:
      CityHall
      Throws:
      DatabaseNotFoundException - the connection to the database could not be instantiated

    • checkUserCredentials

      protected static UserType checkUserCredentials​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws DatabaseNotFoundException
      This method checks if a user credentials are correct and at the same time it returns its user type
      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the user to be checked
      password - : the password of the user to be checked
      Returns:
      UserType : returns if the user type of the user the credentials are correct, null if no correspondence is found
      Throws:
      DatabaseNotFoundException - the connection to the database could not be instantiated

    • modifyUser

      protected static boolean modifyUser​(java.lang.String oldUsername, java.lang.String oldPassword, UserType user, java.lang.String newEmail, java.lang.String newUsername, java.lang.String newPassword) throws DatabaseNotFoundException
      Modifies the user name , password and email of a user using the given String parameters
      Parameters:
      oldUsername - : the user name of the user before being modified
      oldPassword - : the password of the user before being modified
      user - : the user type of the user to be modified
      newEmail - : the new email address of the user
      newUsername - : the new user name of the user
      newPassword - : the new password of the user
      Returns:
      boolean : returns true if the modification is successful false otherwise
      Throws:
      DatabaseNotFoundException - the connection to the database could not be instantiated

      Parameters:
      oldUsername - : the user name of the user before being modified

      user - : the user type of the user to be modified
      newUsername - : the new user name of the user
      newPassword - : the new password of the user
      Returns:
      boolean : returns true if the modification is successful false otherwise
      Throws:
      DatabaseNotFoundException - the connection to the database could not be instantiated

      Removes a user given its user name and password
      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the user to be deleted
      password - : the password of the user to be deleted
      user - : the user type of the user to be deleted
      Returns:
      boolean: true if the deletion is successful, false if fails
      Throws:
      DatabaseNotFoundException - the connection to the database could not be instantiated
